description.value:
You gain one of the following feats as a bonus feat, provided you meet all the prerequisites of the chosen feat: @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.Item.Ytx8fJ0lmj5yE11I]{Combat-Trained Mount}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.Item.YH6jLn6TKpKcoRY0]{Creature Companion Adept}, or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.Item.39g2b0uSQIAEANLn]{Squox Companion}. You obtain a level 1 creature companion or a trained Squox free of charge, who automatically has an attitude of helpful toward you.

In addition, you can have a number of bonded creature companions equal to your number of ranks in the Survival skill. However, only one creature companion (defined as an “active” creature companion) at a time can accompany you on an adventure.
